required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase II Study for Combination of Camrelizumab and SBRT in the First-line Treatment for R/M HNSCC
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Study for Combination of Camrelizumab and Stereotacic Radiotherapy in the First-line Treatment for Recurrent or Metastatic Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a prospective, single-center, open-label, phase II clinical study for patients with recurrent or metastatics quamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Combination of camrelizumab and stereotacic radiotherapy

secondary_outcome.description: OS is the time interval from the start of treatment to death due to any reason or lost of follow-up

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the first drug administration to within 30 days for the last therapy

clinical_study.condition: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
clinical_study.keyword: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

condition_browse.mesh_term: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Head and Neck
